title: 请问有没有死亡惩罚的mod
author: chunjienan
txt_content: 关闭死亡掉落后感觉太简单了

replies.author: 豆丁宝宝龙
replies.txt_content:
[1.7.10~1.10.2][SSP/SMP][永更]LimitedLives有限的生命数---珍惜生命，别再作死！
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=488668
(出处: http://www.mcbbs.net/)

replies.author: 吕易天
replies.txt_content: 你可以用命令方块来实现

replies.txt_content:
有限的生命]LimitedLives
